column1: I wouldn't put it past Trump to have cut funding to the CDC & implemented no measures to combat Coronavirus in order for him & his Big Pharma donors to make a profit off all of us to further the class divide killing millions destroying the USA. #TrumpVirus #Trump #coronavirusus

I am almost thinking that Trump cut funds to the CDC & did all of this so that the Coronavirus would outbreak here so he & his Big Pharma can make a profit off all of us. This will only further the class divide ruining our country. Trump & the GOP are this evil & sinister.
